IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: Design History Foundation Inc. publishes an electronic journal, Places. It is intended to educate the public in the ways in which buildings, landscapes, regulations and patterns of use affect our daily lives.
IRS990.MissionDesc: Design History Foundation Inc. publishes an electronic journal, Places. It is intended to educate the public in the ways in which buildings, landscapes, regulations and patterns of use affect our daily lives.
IRS990.Desc: Design History Foundation publishes an open-access, online journal, Places. It is an interdisciplinary journal of contemporary architecture, landscape and urbanism that focuses on the public realm as both physical space and social ideal. It is dedicated to advancing greater awareness of the expansive value of design research and practice, with the ultimate goal of promoting sustainable cities, innovative architecture and healthy landscapes.The journal has created a multi-platform editorial space that bridges between the immediacy and scope of serious journalism with the precision and depth of scholarship, reinvigorating the tradition of the public intellectual. It has also created a searchable archive of all its 30-year history of content.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Footnote for uncertain tax position under FIN 48 (Part X)
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Organization has evaluated the tax positions taken on returns for open years and those expected to be taken on returns for the year ended December 31, 2022. It is managements belief that such tax positions are more likely than not to be sustained upon examination by tax authorities. Accordingly, no liability for uncertain tax positions has been reflected in these financial statements. Returns for tax years beginning with those filed for the year ended December 31, 2019 are open to examination.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990 governing body review Part VI line 11
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A copy of the form 990 is given to the governing body for review prior to submittal of the return to the Internal Revenue Service.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Conflict of interest policy compliance Part VI line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The organization requires each officer or director to review a copy of the Policy on Conflicts of Interest and Disclosure of Certain Interests and to acknowledge in writing that he or she has done so. Additionally, each officer or director annually completes a disclusure form identifying any relationships, positions or circumstances in which the officer or director is involved that he or she believes could contribute to a conflict of interest arising.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: CEO executive director top management comp Part VI line 15a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Board of Directors establishes the compensation package for the Executive Director (Editor) that is within the range of organizations similar in size and scope of the Design History Foundation.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Governing documents etc available to public Part VI line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: All organizations governing documents are made available for public inspection upon request.
